name: getImage
description: This endpoint shows information about an image, including a URL to a preview image and the sizes that it is available in.

language.description: Language for the keywords and categories in the response

view.description: Amount of detail to render in the response

search_id.description: The ID of the search that is related to this request

**affiliate_url**: Affiliate referral link; appears only for registered affiliate partners
**aspect**: Aspect ratio of the image in decimal format, such as 0.6667
**assets**: Information about the assets that are part of an image
**display_name**: Display name of this image size
**file_size**: File size (in bytes) of this image size
**is_licensable**: Whether or not this image can be licensed in this image size
**height**: Height in pixels of the image thumbnail
**width**: Width in pixels of the image thumbnail
